readable.title: 3444982197_0ff15cc50b
readable.content: a man in a purple shirt is looking at a man in a black shirt who is pulling a funny face . A man in a purple shirt looking at a man in a black shirt making a silly face . a man watching another man do a kissing pose Man making kissing face for the camera , while another man looks on . Two men sit together and one looks at the other while he makes a funny face .
